meanings.definition: Attractive or eye-catching in style or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The pizazzy dress sparkled under the lights.
meanings.sent2: Her pizazzy accessories always stood out in a crowd.
meanings.sent3: The pizazzy decorations made the party feel extra special.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline looked pizazzy against the setting sun.
meanings.sent5: The pizazzy car turned heads wherever it went.

meanings.sent1: The children's pizazzy dance performance impressed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The concert was pizazzy with the crowd cheering and clapping.
meanings.sent3: The pizazzy puppy ran around the yard with joy.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as pizazzy as a burst of confetti.
meanings.sent5: The festival atmosphere was pizazzy and infectious.

meanings.definition: Having a lively or showy quality.
meanings.sent1: The pizazzy personality of the host kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent2: The parade was pizazzy with colorful floats and costumes.
meanings.sent3: The pizazzy magician amazed the audience with tricks.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as pizazzy as a sparkling gem.
meanings.sent5: The pizazzy performance left a lasting impression on the audience.
